tr_sharedMinistry: Nandray anjara tamin’ny fanompoana nandritra ny volana
tr_addRecordDesc: Mampidira firaketana vaovao mba hanana tatitra ho an’ity volana ity ianao.
tr_extraTimeDesc: Tianao afindra ho an’ny volana manaraka ve izany?
tr_applicationAPS: FANGATAHANA HANAO NY FANOMPOAN’NY MPISAVA LALANA MPANAMPY
tr_applicationAPSDesc: Tia an’i Jehovah sy te hanampy ny hafa hianatra momba azy sy ny ﬁkasany feno ﬁtiavana aho, ka maniry hampitombo ny fotoana hanompoako eny amin’ny saha. Te ho mpisava lalana mpanampy àry aho mandritra ny fe-potoana voalaza eto ambany:
tr_continuousAPS: Te ho mpisava lalana mpanampy foana aho mandra-pisin’ny ﬁlazana hafa.
tr_pioneerApplicationMoral: Tsara ﬁtondran-tena aho ary manana fahazarana tsara. Efa nanao fandaharana aho mba hanatratrarana ny ora takina amiko.—Jereo Ny Fanompoantsika Ilay Fanjakana Jona 2013, p. 2.
tr_noteAPSApplication: FANAMARIHANA: Raha azo atao, dia alefaso herinandro alohan’ny fotoana tianao hanombohana ny fanompoan’ny mpisava lalana mpanampy ity fangatahana ity, fara fahatarany. Tsy ho alefa any amin’ny biraon’ny sampana ity fangatahana ity, fa hotehirizina ao amin’ny antontan-taratasin’ny ﬁangonana.
tr_attentionServiceCommittee:
Ho an’ny Komitin’ny Fanompoan’ny Fiangonana:

1. Tsara toetra ve ilay mpanao fangatahana ka manana fomba ﬁaina kristianina fakan-tahaka?

2. Tsy mahafeno fepetra izay nomena fananarana na voaray indray tato anatin’ny herintaona na izay mbola misy fameperana ampiharina aminy.

3. Efa nanontanianareo ve ny hevitry ny mpiandraikitra ny andia-mpitory misy azy?
tr_moreInformationForAP: Interested in becoming a full-time pioneer? Apply at hub.jw.org or contact the elders in your congregation.
tr_hourGoalDesc: Tokony ho 30 ny ora tratrarina raha hanao mpisava lalana mpanampy mitohy. Afaka manatratra 15 ora ihany anefa ianao amin’ireo volana ampandrenesan’ny anti-panahy hoe azo anaovana an’izany.
tr_applicationSubmittedDesc: Hodinihan’ny komitin’ny fanompoana ilay izy, ary hampahafantatra anao ry zareo raha ekeny izany.
tr_maxPublisherShift: Isan’ny mpitory betsaka indrindra afaka miaraka: {{ maxPublisherCount }}
tr_partnerNeededDesc: Ho hitan’ny mpitory hafa ity, ka afaka handmina programa miaraka aminao ry zareo
tr_havePartnerDesc: Safidio eo amin’ny lisitra ny anarany na soraty
tr_addToCalendarDesc: Tianao ampidirina ao amin’ny kalandrie ampiasainao ve ity fandaharana ity? Tokony efa manana programa fijerena kalandrie ianao ao amin’ny fitaovana ampiasainao.
tr_deletePWLocation: Hamafa toerana be olona azo itoriana
tr_deletePWLocationDesc: Hifafa daholo ny firaketana mifandray amin’ity toerana ity sy ireo fandaharam-potoana miaraka aminy. Tsy azo iverenana intsony ity safidy ity.
tr_cantDeductStudiesDesc: Tsy afaka misafidy mpianatra Baiboly latsaky ny isa efa nosoratanao eo amin’ny isan’ny fampianarana Baiboly notarihana ianao.
tr_cantDeductStudiesTitle: Tsy afaka ahena ny isan’ny mpianatra
tr_includesServiceAndCredit: Mitambatra ao ny fanompoana eny amin’ny saha sy ny ora omena
tr_noDailyRecordsDesc: Tsy mbola misy tatitra ho an’ny andro. Mampidira vaovao mba ho hita ao amin’ny tatitrao mandritra ny volana.
tr_assignAuxPioBtn: Mpisava lalana mpanampy amin’ity volana ity
tr_reportPageInfo: Hitanao eto ny tatitra avy any amin’ireo mpitory, fa azonao atao koa ny mampiditra tatitra ho an’ireo izay tsy mampiasa Organized. Misafidiana mpitory iray.
tr_alreadySubmittedWarning: Efa nalefa any amin’ny Biraon’ny Sampana ny tatitra ho an’io volana io. Ireo tatitra tara ihany sisa no azo ampidirina. Raha tsy maintsy hanao fanovana ianao, dia ataovy hoe tsy mbola lasa any amin’ny sampana aloha ilay tatitra.
tr_submitReportDesc: Submit the report for this month to your elders?
tr_noDailyRecordsMonthClosed: No daily service records for this month.
tr_undoSubmissionDesc: Are you sure to undo the submission of this report? Please note that this will also remove the report already sent to the secretary.
tr_undoSubmissionDone: Please make any necessary adjustments to this report and submit it again as soon as possible
tr_specialMonthsDesc: List of months where auxiliary pioneers can report 15 hours
tr_bibleStudiesNotice: Report one study per student each month
tr_hoursCreditPresetAddedInfo: The chosen credit hours preset will appear in the monthly report's comment field. Edit it there if needed.
tr_S10ReportNotGenerated: This year’s report hasn’t been generated yet. Generate it to see all the details and then submit.
tr_quickAssignAPDesc: This publisher is assigned as an auxiliary pioneer this month. You can change this on the publisher's enrollments list on the Persons page.
tr_S21CardTitleDesc: Select ‘All records’ to export and sort all records for publishers, full-time, and auxiliary servants, or ‘Specific records’ to export records only for selected publishers.
tr_S21ExportMultipleDesc: Select the publishers you want to include in the exported records. Each publisher will have a separate file.
